constituent: do, so, strange building, tail feathers
heisigStory: This character rightly belongs to the previous lesson, but we held it until now because of the final element, the tail feathers. After the drop at the outset, the next three strokes are completely novel and should be given special attention.
koohiiStory1: In this kanji, you can see 3 katakana characters: ソ, ユ, and then ユ again followed by TAIL FEATHERS. STORY: "So (ソ) you (ユ) wanna DO it?" "Only if you (ユ) do" says the female bird as she raises her TAIL FEATHERS.
koohiiStory2: Do me from behind, says the bird, as she shakes her tailfeathers.
kunYomi: ため、な.る、な.す、す.る、たり、つく.る、なり
words: do, try, play, practice, cost, serve as, pass, elapse
change, be of use, reach to
